message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and I believe it would greatly benefit your business. Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $15000. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive setup and consultation package to ensure its seamless integration into your operations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing, but I'm looking for a more affordable solution. Could we discuss a price closer to my budget, around $8000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget considerations. In light of this, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $9500 for the product, including all the additional services. I believe this price still reflects the value of the product while accommodating your financial needs.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we aim for a price closer to $7500? I believe this would better align with what I'm able to offer while still receiving a high-quality product and service.

I appreciate your feedback, Bob. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer the product at $8500, which includes all the services and benefits you've been seeking. I hope this price point will better align with your budget while still ensuring you receive a high-quality product and service.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. Based on my budget, I believe we can reach an agreement at $8000. This price respects the value of the product and services while fitting within my financial limits.
